benchmark.name: jpeg
benchmark.description:
The JPEG Transcoder takes as input a JPEG image and then decodes it, specifies a much higher level of JPEG compression, and then re-encodes it as a JPEG.
Other files: JPEGtoBMP.str produces output.bmp.int, JPEG.str does not compile strc -library JPEG.str Transcoder_Raw.str ??

impl.desc: StreamIt version of JPEG decoder/encoder. strc -library Transcode.str -i1 does not seem to terminate. presumably testing would want to look at output.jpg.int
